channel.title: Having troubles updating my source. Delta based, (syscape)
channel.description:
well i downloaded this syscape source, and im working on it testing stuff out, and when i compile and run server, nothing is updated but when i check back in the files it still says what i changed. in the source i got "players" folder " "source" folder, compiler, runserver.
on my runserver.bat it says[code]@echo off title SysCape Server v 3.0 cd Source/Bin Java -Xmx1024m -cp .;mysql-connector.jar server pause[/code] so when i open source, thats where all the .java and .class files are plus another run.bat and compiler. when i open the bin folder thats inside the source folder there is.. all .class files again plus clicking.java and client.java plus ecoreset.bat
any idea why my server wont update what i update? in need of alot of help.

item.title: Having troubles updating my source. Delta based, (syscape)
item.dc:creator: @xsystex xsystex
item.description:
@xsystex wrote:

Once you compile copy the .class files and copy em into the “bin” folder, since the files in there are the ones that runs the server…

Read full topic
item.source: Having troubles updating my source. Delta based, (syscape)

item.title: Having troubles updating my source. Delta based, (syscape)
item.dc:creator: @mrtool mrtool
item.description:
@mrtool wrote:

ok can u help me now, i have thee exact saammmee source and i have a problem, it wont let me compile.

heres what the compiler looks like.

@echo off
title Galkons Compiler
cd source
“C:\sun\sdk\jdk\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

i changed it to this…

@echo off
title Galkons Compiler
cd Source/Bin
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

and i still get problems…help please!

Read full topic

nevermind im good, i fixed my problem, it was the compiler.

@bowzer wrote:

@echo off title Galkons Compiler cd source "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

i think i might have to change the compiler to this code maybe?@echo off title Galkons Compiler cd Source/Bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause?
